imdb.plot outline: This show chronicles the day in the life of an Original Gangsta Rapper. The man behind the long history of "anti system" songs, block hero to a generation of people that included Tupac Shakur, living the life of Good fortune and teaching his children and others how to become better, by doing better. Laugh, sing and hang out with the Boss as he records his new album, video, movies and raises his family.....
imdb.title: C-Bo: Life in Gangsta Rap
akas: C-Bo: Life in Gangsta Rap (United States)
plot: This show chronicles the day in the life of an Original Gangsta Rapper. The man behind the long history of "anti system" songs, block hero to a generation of people that included Tupac Shakur, living the life of Good fortune and teaching his children and others how to become better, by doing better.
